name: easymongo
description: Simple interface for the MongoDB API
author: Alexey Simonenko <alexey@simonenko.dev>

scripts.coverage: istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R dot && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run mocha && npm run mocha coverage
